item.title: Compilation de préférences pour les systèmes d'aide à la décision
item.description: Contexte général The Master’s level Internships provide the opportunity for hands-on experience in a student affairs setting. I had the chance to add an interesting experience to my CV by doing a 5-month internship with Institut de recherche en informatique de Toulouse (IRIT) as part of ANITI project. In this internship I worked on the following subject “Preferences compilation for decision suport systems” in the next section I’ll explainto you the subject in more detail.
